00046   public sc_core::sc_export<IF>,
00047   public tlm_target_port_base {

00051   typedef tlm_target_port_base target_port_base_type;

00139 template<typename IF>
00140 tlm_target_port<IF>::tlm_target_port(const char * name) :
00141   sc_core::sc_export<interface_type>(name)

00146 /* Return true and issue an error message if the port is already bound to an interface during the 
00147    binding of other_if (called by bind(sc_export))
00148 */
00149 template<typename IF>
00150 bool tlm_target_port<IF>::is_already_bound(sc_core::sc_interface * other_if) {
00151   if (dynamic_cast<sc_core::sc_interface * >(this->get_interface()) == NULL) return(false);
00152   else {
00153     std::string if_name1,if_name2 ;
00154     sc_core::sc_object * tmp = dynamic_cast<sc_core::sc_object * >(other_if);
00155     if (tmp) if_name1 = tmp->name();
00156     else if_name1 = "unnamed interface (non sc_object)";
00157     tmp = dynamic_cast<sc_core::sc_object * >(this->get_interface());
00158     if (tmp) if_name2 = tmp->name();
00159     else if_name2 = "unnamed interface (non sc_object)";
00160 
00161     std::string msg(sc_core::sc_object::name());
00162     msg += (std::string)(": tlm_target_port warning, Can't bind to \"") + if_name1;
00163     msg += (std::string)("\" interface,the target port is already bound to this interface: \"");
00164     msg += if_name2 + (std::string)("\"\n");
00165     SC_REPORT_WARNING("binding warning",msg.c_str());
00166 
00167     return(true);
00168   }
00169 }
00170 
00171 //---------------------------
00172 // sc_export overridden methods
00173 //---------------------------
00174   
00175 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 // before_end_of_elaboration()
00177 // Called just before end of elaboration to propagate the significant target port id 
00178 // The only significant target port id is the one set by the module which implements the 
00179 // tlm core interface
00180 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 template<typename IF>
00182 void 
00183 tlm_target_port<IF>::before_end_of_elaboration()
00184 {
00185   // if this target port is not directly connected to the core interface
00186   if (get_target_port_list().size() > 1) {
00187 
00188     for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator target_port = get_target_port_list().begin();
00189         target_port != get_target_port_list().end();
00190         target_port++) {                          
00191       set_tlm_export_id((*target_port)->get_tlm_export_id());   // Propagate the target port id
00192     }
00193   }
00194 }
00195 
00196 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 // end_of_elaboration(). Debug message concerning target port list centent
00198 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00199 template<typename IF>
00200 void 
00201 tlm_target_port<IF>::end_of_elaboration() {
00202 
00203 #ifdef TLM_PORT_DEBUG
00204   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: Registered target port list :\n",sc_core::sc_object::name());
00205   for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator port = get_target_port_list().begin();
00206       port != get_target_port_list().end();
00207       port++) {
00208     printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: \t- %s\n",sc_core::sc_object::name(),(static_cast<target_port_type * >(*port))->name());      
00209   }
00210   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: -------------------------------------------------------\n",sc_core::sc_object::name());
00211 #endif
00212     
00213 }
00214 //---------------------------------------------------------
00215 // Special binding between two target ports 
00216 //---------------------------------------------------------
00217 
00218 // bind(sc_export)
00219 template<typename IF>
00220 void 
00221 tlm_target_port<IF>::bind(target_port_type& target_port_)
00222 {
00223   // If the target port is still not bound
00224   if (!is_already_bound(target_port_.get_interface())) {
00225     // Copy the list of registered target ports to the current bound port (port propagation)
00226     for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator target_port = target_port_.get_target_port_list().begin();
00227         target_port != target_port_.get_target_port_list().end();
00228         target_port++) {
00229       this->register_target_port(*target_port);
00230     }
00231       
00232     // Calls sc_export standard bind method
00233     sc_core::sc_export<interface_type>::bind(target_port_);
00234   }
00235 }
00236 
00237 // Specific case: if the bound export is based on a different interface. Requirement, the interface of 
00238 // the bound export MUST derive from the interface the export is based on.
00239 template<typename IF>
00240 template<typename OTHER_IF>
00241 void 
00242 tlm_target_port<IF>::bind(tlm_target_port<OTHER_IF>& target_port_) {
00243   // Test if OTHER_IF derives from IF
00244   IF * other_if = dynamic_cast<IF*>(target_port_.get_interface());
00245   if (other_if) {
00246     // If the target port is still not bound
00247     if (!is_already_bound(target_port_.get_interface())) {
00248       // Copy the list of registered target ports to the current bound port (port propagation)
00249       for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator target_port = target_port_.get_target_port_list().begin();
00250           target_port != target_port_.get_target_port_list().end();
00251           target_port++) { 
00252         this->register_target_port(*target_port);
00253       }
00254         
00255       // Calls sc_export standard bind method 
00256       sc_core::sc_export<interface_type>::bind(*other_if);
00257     }
00258   }
00259   else {
00260     std::string msg(sc_core::sc_object::name());
00261     msg += (std::string)(": tlm_target_port error, incompatible interface detected during the binding tlm_target_port  \"") + (std::string)(this->name());
00262     msg += (std::string)" to tlm_target_port \"" + (std::string)(target_port_.name()) +(std::string)("\"\n") ;
00263     SC_REPORT_ERROR("bind export to export failed",msg.c_str());
00264   }
00265 
00266 }
00267 
00268   
00269 //---------------------------------------------------------
00270 // Normal binding between port and interface.
00271 // To be redefined here (bind(port_) is overridden above
00272 //---------------------------------------------------------
00273   
00274 // bind(interface_type) 
00275 template<typename IF>
00276 void 
00277 tlm_target_port<IF>::bind(interface_type& interface_) {
00278   // Calls sc_export standard bind method
00279   sc_core::sc_export<interface_type>::bind(interface_);
00280 }
00281   
00282 // operator() (interface_type): just calls bind(interface_type)
00283 template<typename IF>
00284 void 
00285 tlm_target_port<IF>::operator() (interface_type& interface_) {
00286   sc_core::sc_export<interface_type>::bind(interface_); 
00287 }
